inclusion.criterion: Acute MI according to AHA criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable body weight (+2 kg) in the preceding 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of prediabetes based upon the ADA criteria
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: T2DM or T1DM according to the ADA criteria
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects receiving medications known to affect glucose tolerance
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major organ disease like cancer, chronic pulmonary or liver disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis and is being treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers for cardiomyopathy.
